Question: Sony Honda Mobility Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sony Honda Mobility Inc.

Afeela Prototype at CES 2024

- Updated electric sedan prototype with production-ready revisions
- Revised front-end styling, traditional side mirrors, and thicker roof pillars
- Larger center console with dual wireless charging pads
- AI for driver assistance systems and Vision Transformer for path planning
- Partnership with Epic Games for immersive displays and in-car gaming
- Collaboration with Microsoft for a conversational personal agent
- Interior Permanent Magnet Synchronous Motors producing 482 hp
- 91 kWh lithium-ion battery pack with DC charger up to 150 kW
- Measures 193.5 inches long
- Aimed for mass production, pre-order in 2025, and delivery in 2026.
